column3: Great location very friendly staff comfortable room
Excellent location,good breakfast and friendly owners.
Delicious breakfast, very good late night check-in. Excellent staff.
The accommodation, The breakfast was excellent and the location was close to all amenities and the hosts very friendly.
We enjoy a good quality family run hotel and Hotel Ambrosia met our expectations. Great location. Comfortable room. Very personable service. Very good hot breakfast.
Warm friendly & comical welcome. Very very clean. Eggs & bacon excellent.

Stayed at this lovely bnb for a weekend getaway and to also explore the WWI sites. Everything was lovely - the bed is super comfy, the staff very friendly, and the breakfast excellent! It is right near the center of town so just an easy walk to everything. There are also bikes for rent so I took one out and the bike was also excellent.
